label: Family
value: A clean, fun, and age-appropriate question for a family-level game. Simple, inclusive, and suitable for all ages.

label: Cousins
value: A fun, teasing, and slightly mischievous question for cousins. Light-hearted and playful with a family vibe..

label: Friends
value: A playful and surprising question for a friends-level game. Light-hearted, bold, or funny,

label: School
value: A funny, relatable, and school-appropriate question for friends at school. Keep it light, fun, and easy to understand..

label: Adventure
value: An exciting and daring question for an adventure-level game. Encourages stepping out of the comfort zone.

label: Stranger
value: A respectful, easygoing icebreaker for strangers. Socially appropriate and light in tone.

label: Long Distance
value: A romantic and emotional question for long-distance couples. Meant to deepen connection.

label: Couple
value: A sweet, intimate, and meaningful question for couples. Light, romantic, and easy to answer..

label: Steamy
value: A flirty and sensual question for a steamy game. Tasteful yet exciting. For adults only,.

label: Sexual
value: A bold, explicit, and adult-only question for a sexual-level game. Strictly 18+, provocative and daring.

label: Party Mode
value: A chaotic, hilarious, or outrageous question for a wild party. Pure fun and entertainment..

label: Workplace
value: A safe and awkwardly funny question for workplace games. Keeps it professional yet entertaining.

label: Teens
value: A fun, respectful, and age-appropriate question for teens. Cool, clear, and casual..

label: Sober & Chill
value: A relaxed, reflective, or gently fun question for a calm environment. Meant for quiet moments.

label: Dark Mode
value: A twisted, mysterious, or eerie question for a dark-themed game. Unexpected and creative..

label: Extreme
value: A wild, fearless, and intense question that pushes limits while staying realistic.

label: Meme/Joke
value: An absurd, bizarre, or meme-inspired question meant to make people laugh. Ridiculous fun..

label: Deep Truths
value: A vulnerable, emotional, and introspective truth question. Honest and personal.

label: Daredevil
value: A physical, bold, and safe dare-only challenge. Social or movement-based, exciting and doable..

label: Self-Reflection
value: A personal, honest truth question meant to trigger introspection and self-awareness..

label: Online Friends
value: A fun, inclusive question designed for remote or online gameplay. Friendly and engaging..

label: First Date
value: A charming and playful icebreaker perfect for a first date. Cute, light, and flirty..

label: Bachelorette
value: A bold, cheeky, and fun question for a bachelorette party. Wild but tasteful.

label: Sleepover
value: A funny, bonding, and slightly daring question for sleepovers. Creative and spontaneous..

label: Fitness Dare
value: A movement-based, active dare (no truth) that encourages safe physical activity. Fun and energizing..

label: Geek Mode
value: A nerdy, fandom-based, or smart question full of playful or technical references.

label: Controversial Truths
value: A bold, thought-provoking truth question meant to spark deep thinking or debate..

label: Wholesome
value: A kind, uplifting, and feel-good question that spreads positivity and smiles..

label: Creative
value: An expressive, imaginative question that sparks originality and artful thinking.
